title: auth api google login functionality
description: Test the Google Sign-In authentication endpoint to ensure it securely verifies user credentials, creates user sessions, and automatically creates Store data upon registration.

title: auth api guest login functionality
description: Verify the guest login endpoint allows users to access the system without credentials and creates a temporary session with associated Store data.

title: auth api email password login fallback
description: Validate the email/password authentication fallback endpoint for secure credential verification, session creation, and Store setup.

title: customer management api customer crud operations
description: Test the CRUD operations for customers including creation, retrieval, update, and deletion, ensuring data integrity and correct linkage to logs/khata.

title: payment billing api payment recording and verification
description: Verify payment recording and verification endpoints correctly update ledger balances, reflect payment history, and handle payment receipt uploads.

title: affiliate api referral tracking and payout requests
description: Test the affiliate API for unique referral code generation, signup tracking, prevention of self-referrals, commission tracking, and payout request validation.

title: public ledger api secure customer ledger access
description: Validate that public ledger URLs securely display only the respective customer's dues and transaction records without requiring login.
